paragraphs.text:
%md ## DIMSUM
### Dimension Independent Matrix Square using MapReduce
* Sample sparse columns (many zero's) at a higher probability
* Sample dense columns (many non-zero's) at a lower probability

### Intuition: _Reduce shuffle_ by sampling dense columns less since they exist in more trials

[Databricks Blog Post](https://databricks.com/blog/2014/10/20/efficient-similarity-algorithm-now-in-spark-twitter.html)

result.msg:
DIMSUM

Dimension Independent Matrix Square using MapReduce

  • Sample sparse columns (many zero's) at a higher probability
  • Sample dense columns (many non-zero's) at a lower probability

Intuition: Reduce shuffle by sampling dense columns less since they exist in more trials

Databricks Blog Post

paragraphs.title: Setup Matrix
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix
                                        
val data = Array(  //  doc0,  doc1,  doc2
                Array(  0.0,   1.0,   2.0), // word0
                Array(  2.0,   3.0,   2.0), // word1
                Array(  4.0,   5.0,   2.0)  // word2
           ) 

val rows = sc.parallelize(data).map { row =>
  Vectors.dense(row)
}.cache()

val mat = new RowMatrix(rows)

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix
data: Array[Array[Double]] = Array(Array(0.0, 1.0, 2.0), Array(2.0, 3.0, 2.0), Array(4.0, 5.0, 2.0))
rows: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector] = MapPartitionsRDD[116] at map at <console>:73
mat: org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix = org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix@39cacd75

paragraphs.title: Approximate column Similarities using DIMSUM
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.MatrixEntry

// Similarity Threshold:  Trade-off between performance and error
val similarityThreshold = 0.5 

val approx = mat.columnSimilarities(similarityThreshold)
val approxEntries = approx.entries.map { case MatrixEntry(i, j, v) => ((i, j), v) }
println(s"""\ndoc#\tdoc#\tsimilarity""")
approx.entries.collect().foreach(entry => println(s"""${entry.i}\t${entry.j}\t${entry.value}"""))
